title: When is the Miami final with Novak Djokovic vs. Jakub Mensik?
description: The 2025 Miami Open presented by Itau final between Novak Djokovic and Jakub Mensik will be held on Sunday in Hard Rock Stadium from 3 p.m. ET/9 p.m. CET. Competing in his 60th ATP Masters 1000 final, Djokovic is chasing his 100th tour-level title and record seventh Miami crown. In contrast, the 19-year-old Mensik is aiming to win his first tour-level trophy in what will be just his second final (Doha 2024). For more information on how to watch the final, click here. [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Novak Djokovic will face Jakub Mensik in the Miami Open presented by Itau final on Sunday. Click here for more information.

Miami

Serbain leads Czech 1-0 in Lexus ATP Head2Head series

March 29, 2025

Getty Images

Novak Djokovic will face Jakub Mensik from 3 p.m. ET on Sunday. By ATP Staff

The 2025 Miami Open presented by Itau final between Novak Djokovic and Jakub Mensik will be held on Sunday in Hard Rock Stadium from 3 p.m. ET/9 p.m. CET.

Competing in his 60th ATP Masters 1000 final, Djokovic is chasing his 100th tour-level title and record seventh Miami crown. In contrast, the 19-year-old Mensik is aiming to win his first tour-level trophy in what will be just his second final (Doha 2024).

For more information on how to watch the final, click here.
